medical_history.chief_complaint: Referral due to congenital hypothyroidism in her brother.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began at birth for the index case. The patient was referred at 73 days of age. She exhibited growth parameters below the 25th percentile at referral, indicating issues since birth.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The index case has a brother diagnosed with congenital hypothyroidism at birth. Her other brother is healthy.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents are first-degree relatives, and the brother diagnosed with congenital hypothyroidism had been on levothyroxine replacement since birth.
